title: Himi 14
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
‘Oku fakahinohino
‘E he Tohitapu
‘A e kakai feinga loto
‘I he’enau lotu.
2.
‘Oku tau lotu pea lau
‘I he Tohitapu,
Ke tau ‘ilo ‘a e hala
‘O hotau ‘Otua.
3.
Pea ‘oku tau ‘ilo ai
Hono finangalo
‘I he ngaahi me’a ke fai,
Mo ia ke tuku.
4.
He ko e Folofola tapu
‘A hotau ‘Otua,
‘Oku angatonu ia
Pea ta’engata.
5.
‘Oku tu’u kātoa ‘i ai
Hono finangalo
Ki he kakai tu’utāmaki
‘I he’enau hia.
6. Pea ‘oku faka’ilo
‘E he tohitapu,
Ke tau tui kia Sīsū
Ko hotau ‘Otua.
7.
Pea ‘oku ne tokoni
Ki he kakai vaivai,
‘Oku lotu kumi ki ai
Pea lotu tui.*
